desc: Hi I'm the CEO of a explainer video business.I Have a team of 4 people working for me on freelance basis. I only need a fifth, a sales man/woman.First I tell you what I don't need:I don't need SEO, I don't need people who can't read and just skip to the bidding part.I don't pay more than in this description is said.I don't need leads.I don't need a website I already have one.I don't need whiners.I don't need people with no skills.What I do want:People who can sell.People who have proof they sold different products and service.I don't mind if you never sold anything before if you are sure you can deliver. You can proof this by just delivering me one sale.The payment structure is like this:You sell a 30 second video for a certain amount and get a big percentage of the profit.Lets say the video sells for $ 500,- (this would be the minimum sell price) you wil get 20%, but if you sell it for $ 1000,- You will get 40%, every $ 500,- you sell more you get a bigger cut. It all depends on your selling skills.I don't care how you sell it as long as it's ethical.I will only work with one person at a time just to know where the sales come from.Normally it takes up to 4 weeks before the video is finished. This means you need to have the patience to wait for about that time. I will explain payment in detail with you trough PM.One important thing if you bring in a client who orders more video's after the first one, I will still pay you a commission.If you bid on this then bid the percentage you expect to make from one sale.
title: Hire a Salesman

desc: You will place two backlinks per day (ONLY TWO) if you place more you will be replaced and your job cancelled and not paid.  We will give you a list of keywords and urls to link each keyword. Only sites that have to do with Agriculture, Biology, Forestry, Farms and Farm Animals.  No junk sites, no spam sites, no sites that have more than 50 outbound backlinks.  We use backlink monitoring software, any links that do not fit under our rules will be disavowed and not paid.  PA and MozR must be greater than 4, no links accepted below that.  If backlinks come from PA/MozR >6 we pay double.  ONLY ONE BACKLINK PER SITE, no doubles as the second will be disavowed and not paid. Backlinks must read natural as part of a related text of at least 30 words that you will write. Blog entries are acceptable as 50% of the total.

desc: Inside Sales Agent Training & ManagementISA Goals & Expectations40 Contacts Daily –  A minimum of 40 conversations with “decision makers” (not kids, wrong numbers or house guests) must be made.  This may not sound like that much, but dialing through various wrong numbers, answering machines and calls with no answer takes a while.  Plus, inside sales agents have many other important responsibilities they must perform.  These tasks include entering notes in a database, setting appointments with outside sales agents, lead follow-up or “nurtures”, interaction with outside sales agents, rescheduling appointments, accountability meetings, training, social events, role-play and staff meetings.  Understand that all of these tasks are just as essential to an ISA’s success as making contacts.2-10-40 Appointments –  The expectation for appointments set by an inside sales agent is 2 per day, 10 per week, and 40 per month.  An efficient ISA making 40 contacts a day should be able to establish conversion ratios that meet these expectations.  Imagine how a real estate team’s production will increase with 40 extra listing appointments and buyer consultation appointments each month!5 Contracts Signed A Month –  Setting a standard of 5 contracts signed per month helps ensure the quality of the appointments that ISA’s set for outside sales agents.  Also understand that 5 contracts signed is a minimum standard.  Often times the appointments set by inside sales agents will result in 10 or 15 contracts signed during busier Spring and Summer months.ISA Base Salary – $24,000 – $30,000 per yearISA Bonus Structure –  Bonuses are compensated on 5% of gross commission income (GCI) after closing.
title: Real estate lead generation
